page.title: 01 The St. Lawrence Area
page.content: The area covered by our grid reference 06360282 and the surrounding area, is purely agricultural. It has several farms dotted around the area and a very few small housing developments. The main A144 Bungay to Halesworth road passes through the middle of the grid. It is called Stone Street and was once a Roman road. "The Huntsman and Hounds public house, once known as the "Chequers", is sited on the main A144 road and is a popular eating and drinking place for locals and travellers. Ilketshall St. Lawrence Primary School is also sited within the grid area.It has been in use since 1878 and presently caters for 65 children from 5 to 9 years old.
